concept.title: Full or Incremental Queries
concept.shortdesc: JDBC Consumer runs in incremental mode by default.

conbody.p: When you start the pipeline for the first time, JDBC Consumer starts reading with the initial offset. When you stop the pipeline, the notes where it stopped reading as an offset. When you restart the pipeline, the uses the offset information in the query to read from where it stopped earlier.

In incremental mode, you can reset the origin to use the initial offset the next time you start the pipeline. Or, to perform a full query each time you start the pipeline, clear the Incremental Mode property.
